data.name: The Outer Radius
data.detailed_description:
Lead a caravan of survivors through a world on the brink of collapse. Scavenge for resources, form bonds with your fellow survivors, and make difficult choices in this turn-based strategy roguelite. Will you survive long enough to reach the Outer Radius?

Features:
  • Engage in unique turn-based combat. Will you stealth your way past, or will you kill for what you need?
  • Travel towards the Outer Radius. Explore various locations and meet other survivors as you search for the resources you need to upgrade your caravan and gear.
  • Equip, craft, and use dozens of items from revolvers, kevlar vests, stun guns, molotov cocktails, and more
  • Form bonds with your fellow survivors, learn more about their pasts, and uncover more about the world around you.
  • Manage your caravan: who will get rations, who will go out to scavenge, and who you will take in or cast out?
  • Experience something new every playthrough: randomized events, survivors, and maps means no two playthroughs are the same.
